short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that reduces the list of AWS SSO accounts via custom regex filters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AWS SSO Account Filter is a browser extension that filters out AWS accounts you don't care about.

Enter valid JS flavoured regex in the popup input field to view the accounts you're interested in.

Your regex can be as simple as 'dev' or something more complex.
